narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Victoria Davenport is a Counselor, Mental Health provider based in Great Falls, MT. From 2018-05 through 2024-12, this provider received $408K in Medicaid payments across 6K claims serving 2K beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 95% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 90837 (90837). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Spending more than doubled from $62K in 2018 to $135K in 2024 (118% growth).
Saw a 3.3× spike in 2019 ($62K → $203K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
